scripts.flatten: NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" truffle-flattener src/voids/NefVoid.sol > contracts/voids/NefVoid.sol && truffle-flattener src/runes/Nef.sol > contracts/runes/Nef.sol && truffle-flattener src/chefs/NefChef.sol > contracts/chefs/NefChef.sol && truffle-flattener src/ArcaneItemMintingStation.sol > contracts/ArcaneItemMintingStation.sol && truffle-flattener src/ArcaneItemFactoryV1.sol > contracts/ArcaneItemFactoryV1.sol && truffle-flattener src/ArcaneItems.sol > contracts/ArcaneItems.sol && truffle-flattener src/Timelock.sol > contracts/Timelock.sol && truffle-flattener src/runes/Test.sol > contracts/runes/Test.sol && truffle-flattener src/chefs/TestChef.sol > contracts/chefs/TestChef.sol && truffle-flattener src/voids/TestVoid.sol > contracts/voids/TestVoid.sol && truffle-flattener src/TokenTimelock.sol > contracts/TokenTimelock.sol
